attributes.additional_details: Heathrow should roll back its operations to the 2012 level, the noise pollution is unbearable....Heathrow has expanded its operations to the point where large swathes of the home counties are suffering,  The Transport Minister should get to grips with Heathrow and make them reduce there operations to the level we could all tolerate, and not be hoodwinked into believing everything is OK,  its not !!
